## defGetterUnsafe variable

Unchecked version of .

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
defGetterUnsafe: <T = any>(path: Path) => Fn<any, T | undefined>
```

## Remarks

The type parameter `T` can be used to indicate the type of the nested value to be retrieved (default: `any`<!-- -->).

Also see: , [getInUnsafe](./paths.getinunsafe.md)

## Example


```ts
const g = defGetterUnsafe("a.b.c");

g({ a: { b: { c: 23} } }) // 23
g({ x: 23 }) // undefined
g() // undefined

```
